pr_title: Private IP Manager to Support IP Address Replacement

timeline.message:

merge

timeline.bodyText: Since PortContext is shared by multiple modules, is the meaning of the name result unclear?

replies.bodyText: I will update the name 'result' to 'FixedIpsResult'

timeline.bodyText:
Should be context.getResult().get(0).getNewIpAddrRequests()?
If send() throws an exception, shouldn't rollback be called? Because updateIpAddress didn't succeed.
So we need to decide whether we need a rollback based on whether the result is empty or not.
